mapper.select: SELECT i.id AS i_id, i.nombre AS i_nombre, i.descripcion AS i_descripcion, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S', i.fechalanzamiento) AS i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS i_formatorenta, i.genero AS i_genero, ti.id AS ti_id FROM VI_ITEMS i JOIN VI_TIPOITEM ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id = ti.id WHERE i.id = #{id}

SELECT i.id AS i_id, i.nombre AS i_nombre, i.descripcion AS i_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento AS i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia AS i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta AS i_formatorenta, i.genero AS i_genero, ti.id AS ti_id, ti.descripcion AS ti_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMS i INNER JOIN VI_TIPOITEM ti ON i.TIPOITEM_id = ti.id;
